definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Recurvature follows after it traverses the ridge axis.
sentences.chinese: 預料尼伯特將於橫過副高脊線後開始轉向。

sentences.english: In this paper neural network is used to learn the ridge orientation.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中使用神經網絡學習的脊線方向。

sentences.english: Enter at heel high ridge walk is very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 輸入腳跟高脊線步行很舒服。

sentences.english: The crease is a kind of stripes irregularly crossing ridges and valleys in the fingerprint.
sentences.chinese: 褶皺是指穿過指紋脊線和谷線的不規則條紋。

sentences.english: NAKRI will traverse the ridge axis of the steering subtropical ridge and recurve.
sentences.chinese: 娜基莉將橫過副熱帶高壓脊的脊線向北後轉東北移動。

sentences.english: This paper presents a method of minutia detection based on tracing fingerprint ridges.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於脊線跟蹤的指紋細節特徵提取方法。
